page.title: 06A TYPICAL DAY. BY CAROLINE
page.content: In the morning I wake up at 7.30 and get up about 7.45 and get dressed.I get mum and dad a cup of tea.I go to school at 8.45 in the car. When I get to school I have a natter to Libby,my best friend,and have an argument.I say to my teacher,"Hello, hello,hello." In school we have register and Assembly.Then I do maths and reading with intervals in the clock room for another argument with Libby. After dinner I make friends with Libby,but then I break friends with Libby in the clock room.I do some work and then it's break.We have a fight with Adam and Daniel and we win. Then I go home and play with Libby for half an hour.I have tea and watch TV.I go to bed about 9.30pm.I read in bed until about 1.00.
